name: Recoil Robot
description: "Recoil Robot"is a game based on the whims of  a small game development team composed of Chinese college students. In this game,players need to manipulate their robot to use the gun's recoil to defeat the opponent. The gun in the game can not shoot bullets, but it  have extremely strong recoil. Players need to reverse the muzzle attack and use the gun body as a bullet to hit the opponent. About game's control: Player1: "AD" moves left and right," W" jumps, "E" turns the cannon, "S" shoots Player2: "←→" move left and right, "↑" jump, "right ctrl" cannon turn, "↓" shoot Tips: 1，the game is only available in two local players. 2，The game is still in the development and optimization stage, there may be some bugs in this Demo,we will fix it in a future update.And We are very sorry for the lack of game experience at this stage.
